attributes.action: Convince the London Olympic Commitee to Change the London 2012 logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo is a confused, badly design piece, out of keeping with all other Olympic logos, that doesn't represent London, The United Kingdom or the people of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
